ValidationRule.description: Partner BD requires unit type Contract
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(Opportunity.RecordType.Name, "PGi"), Contains(Product2.Name, "Partner"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = false, ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c, "Licenses"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c , "Monthly")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c , "Annually")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Unit Type for Partner BD must be Contract or if Licenses it can only have Billing Frequency of Monthly or Annually.
